plot: Pipo de Clown becomes a member of a secret fellowship protecting a mermaid who lives beneath the streets of Amsterdam. She wants to be reunited with her three daughters before marrying her true love, Dries Duiker.
title: Pipo en het grachtengeheim
plot_es: Pipo de Clown becomes a member of a secret fellowship protecting a mermaid who lives beneath the streets of Amsterdam. She wants to be reunited with her three daughters before marrying her true love, Dries Duiker.
plot_en: Pipo de Clown becomes a member of a secret fellowship protecting a mermaid who lives beneath the streets of Amsterdam. She wants to be reunited with her three daughters before marrying her true love, Dries Duiker.
